channel.title: [REQUEST] Simple Auto clicker ;) [REQUEST]
channel.description:
hi, if there are any good coders that are reading this.. i would like a simple auto clicker. but not a co-ordinate one.. one where i pick a colour and it clicks on that color where i click. and how fast i want it.. and also stop when i stop script.
Many Thanks, Zenzo

item.title: [REQUEST] Simple Auto clicker ;) [REQUEST]
item.dc:creator: @exps35 exps35
item.description:
@exps35 wrote:

So you just want a script that clicks on the color you want and rapidly click it?

no need for using anti-ban methods right? What game is this for?
I could make you one (or attempt to) which makes a constant for the color, and for the click speed (maybe amount of clicks). That way you can edit it to your likings.

Tested on: http://www.addictinggames.com/kingofbuttons.html
Got around 100 per second with speed at ‘0’

[code]// You can edit the wait time in ClickColor procedure if you want //
////////////////////////By Exps35//////////////////////////////////
/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

program SimpleAutoClicker;

var
x, y: Integer;
const
itemcolor= 253624743; //Place color here.
speed= 100; //Speed in Miliseconds between clicks

Procedure ClickColor;
begin
FindColor(x, y, itemcolor,0,0,549,399);
wait(0);
MoveMouse(x, y);
Clickmouse(x, y, true);
end;

Begin
Cleardebug
repeat
ClickColor;
Wait(speed);
until(false);
End.[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: [REQUEST] Simple Auto clicker ;) [REQUEST]

hi, if there are any good coders that are reading this… i would like a simple auto clicker. but not a co-ordinate one… one where i pick a colour and it clicks on that color where i click. and how fast i want it… and also stop when i stop script.

Many Thanks,
Zenzo
[/quote]
Which colour do you want it to click on?[/quote]
if you could just put any random colour in "e.g ‘645.765’ <-- and i could pick it my self
@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@

Zenzie:

Why do you guys copy my name?

That is spam. And no nub. if you can read my name is ‘Zenzo’ and ur name is ‘Zenzie’ … so stop saying it on every thread i make.

3.65 kilos:

Maybe doing a search for something like that would benefit you instead of making a topic about it…

all of them are old and are not compatable with the new SCAR.
